item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 7/24/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added “Weekly Meeting Reminder Emails”, sent every Monday to help users stay on top of upcoming meetings. Fixed an issue where the full audio file was not available until the page was refreshed after a meeting ended. Fixed a bug where manually inviting the Copilot to a meeting marked as “Auto-Join Off” could cause the meeting to be hidden from the meeting list.
